risk_factors.description: We have a history of net losses and may not be able to achieve or sustain profitability in the future.
risk_factors.impact: We have incurred net losses in all periods since we began operations and we may not achieve or maintain profitability in the future.

risk_factors.description: We have experienced rapid revenue growth, which may not be indicative of our future performance.
risk_factors.impact: Our rate of revenue growth has slowed in recent periods and may continue to slow in future periods.

risk_factors.description: Adverse economic conditions, including reduced spending on products and solutions for network security, performance, and reliability, may adversely impact our revenue and profitability.
risk_factors.impact: Our operations and financial performance depend in part on worldwide economic conditions and the impact these conditions have on levels of spending.

risk_factors.description: If we are unable to attract new paying and free customers, our future results of operations could be harmed.
risk_factors.impact: The success of our business principally depends on our ability to attract new paying and free customers.

risk_factors.description: We face intense and increasing competition, which could adversely affect our business, financial condition, and results of operations.
risk_factors.impact: The markets for our network and products are intensely competitive and characterized by rapid changes in technology.

business_description.overview: Cloudflareâ€™s mission is to help build a better Internet. We deliver a broad range of services to businesses of all sizes and in all geographies, making them more secure, enhancing the performance of their business-critical applications, and eliminating the cost and complexity of managing individual network hardware.
business_description.products_and_services: Website and application services, secure access service edge (SASE) platform, developer-based solutions, consumer offerings.

legal_proceedings.description: We are currently, and may be in the future, party to intellectual property rights claims and other litigation matters that, if resolved adversely, could have a material impact on our business.

financial_statements.income_statement: Revenue of $1,296.7 million, net loss of $183.9 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
financial_statements.balance_sheet: Total assets of $2,759.8 million, total liabilities of $1,996.7 million as of December 31, 2023.
financial_statements.cash_flow_statement: Net cash provided by operating activities of $254.4 million for the year ended December 31, 2023.
financial_statements.footnotes: Includes stock-based compensation expense of $273.9 million.

management_discussion_analysis.financial_conditions: We have generated significant operating losses from our operations as reflected in our accumulated deficit of $1,023.8 million as of December 31, 2023.
management_discussion_analysis.operations: Revenue increased by $321.5 million, or 33%, for the year ended December 31, 2023 compared to the year ended December 31, 2022.
management_discussion_analysis.liquidity_and_capital_resources: We believe that our existing cash, cash equivalents, and available-for-sale securities will be sufficient to meet our working capital and capital expenditure needs for at least the next 12 months.
